Gitcoin ( https://gitcoin.co ) | Software Engineer(s) - Product | Remote | https://gitcoin.co/about#jobs | https://gitcoin.co/explorer

Gitcoin's mission is to "Grow Open Source". Gitcoin is a toolbox of Ethereum-based smart-contracts that help open source repo maintainers fund, incentivize, and manage work in Open Source Software.

We don't have an ICO or token; We are a team of 9 funded by ConsenSys, and have distributed about $155k to the ecossytem since launch in November 2017.
